duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and troubleshoot problems related to bakery equipment and facility, including electrical controls and related components.
Mentor and support the training needs of a team of skilled mechanics and technicians.
Collaborate with managers to optimize plant efficiency and up-time.
Manage project initiatives and troubleshoot plant issues with staff technicians and contractors.
Improve the predictive and preventative maintenance program and staff skills.
Order spare parts, manage budget, and schedule staff and work to be performed.
Train staff in PLC troubleshooting, mechanical and electrical troubleshooting, maintenance and safety practices.
Responsible for proposing cost estimates for projects, upgrades, and rebuilds.
Adhere to and ensure plant personnel are following all safety and quality rules.
Demonstrate behaviors that reflect the vision and mission of the organization and promote continuous improvement.
Work in a safe manner and promptly report hazards in the work environment.

education_certification.credential: Technical Degree, Military Training, or BS Degree in Engineering, or related discipline. Extensive proven experience in the food industry will be considered in lieu of a degree.
